sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"原谅"之意。
means: excuse ： 口语常用词，语气较轻。指原谅轻微的过错、疏忽或过失。
pardon比excuse正式，指原谅或宽恕严重的过失或法律上的犯罪行为；在社会交场合则指对打搅他人表示歉意。
forgive ： 侧重从心里宽恕某人，暗示放弃一切愤恨和要求报偿的权利。
overlook ： 语气较弱，指宽容或不计较无关大局的过失。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"疏忽，忽略"或"忘记"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: forget, omit, neglect, overlook, disregard, ignore
means: forget ： 普通用词，侧重某事不重要或太复杂而未能记住，也指有意疏忽或忘掉。
omit ： 指有意或无意地忘记做某事，也指删去被视作不重要、不合意的东西。
neglect ： 侧重指有意的忽略或忽视，也可指粗心与疏忽。
overlook ： 指因匆忙而疏忽或视而不见。
disregard ： 多指有意或自觉地不顾某事。
ignore ： 通常指有意不顾，或不理显而易见的事物。

sentence.Network_en: The owners don't want to overlook any opportunity to make a buck.
sentence.Network_cn: 老板们不想错过任何可以赚钱的机会。

sentence.Network_en: You cannot live in a cocoon and overlook these facts.
sentence.Network_cn: 你不能自己缩在套子里而忽略这些事实。

sentence.Network_en: You overlook the pressure you're under and what it does to you.
sentence.Network_cn: 你忽视了你所承受的压力及它带给你的后果。

虐字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 侵害;残害〖 abuse;mishandle〗 轻视;忽视〖 despise;overlook〗 灾害〖 disaster〗.

list.abs: marine organism 海洋生物marine overlooker 海务监督marine ozonizer 船用臭氧发生器
A citadel and palace ona hill overlooking Granada , Spain ., 爱尔罕布拉宫建在山顶俯视西班牙格拉纳达的一座堡垒及宫殿.
overlooking是什... ... Overlooking Purposely ： 睁一只眼闭一只眼 overlooking balcony ： 观景阳台 Nor Overlooking ： 也不忽视.
My calculation was wrong because I overlooked one tiny point., 由于我忽略了一个细微之处 , 我的计算错了.

entry.def: If a building or window overlooks a place, you can see the place clearly from the building or window.

example.ex: Pretty and comfortable rooms overlook a flower-filled garden...
example.tran: 漂亮舒适的房间俯视着花团锦簇的花园。

example.ex: Jack Aldwych lived in a huge, old two-storeyed house overlooking Harbord.
example.tran: 杰克·阿尔德维奇住在一幢可以看见哈博德的巨大的两层旧房子里。

entry.def: If you overlook a fact or problem, you do not notice it, or do not realize how important it is.

example.ex: We overlook all sorts of warning signals about our own health.
example.tran: 我们忽视有关自身健康的种种预警信号。

example.ex: ...a fact that we all tend to overlook.
example.tran: 我们所有人往往视而不见的事实

entry.def: If you overlook someone's faults or bad behaviour, you forgive them and take no action.

example.ex: ...satisfying relationships that enable them to overlook each other's faults.
example.tran: 能使他们互相包容对方缺点的舒心的关系

means.word_mean: 1. a high place affording a good view
2. be oriented in a certain direction;

sentences.sentence: "The house looks out on a tennis court"
"The workers on the conveyor belt miss one out of ten"

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"翻转"; 2. 表示"在……之上"; 3. 表示"过度,过分,超过"

stems_affixes.word_buile: over过度,过分,超过+all全部→adj.全部的, 全面的
over过度,过分,超过+correct改正→adj.矫枉过正的
over过度,过分,超过+crowded拥挤的→adj.挤满的
over超过+sea海+s复数→adv.海外 adj.外国的, 海外的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 紧张过度的,兴奋过度的
stems_affixes.word_buile: over过度,过分,超过+wrought=work工作→过度工作
over翻转+night夜, 夜晚→翻过一夜→一夜间→一下子;突然
over超过+sea海+s复数→adv.海外 adj.外国的, 海外的
over翻转+haul拉→拉过去检修
over翻转+throw扔→扔翻了→推翻
over翻转+turn转→翻转
over在……之上+bridge桥→上面的桥→天桥
over在……之上+coat衣服→在衣服上的衣服→外套
over过度,过分,超过+dose剂量→n.药物过量
over过度,过分,超过+production生产→n.生产过度
over过度,过分,超过+study学习→n.用功过度
over过度,过分,超过+work工作→n.过度劳累
over在……之上+lap交叉→[大腿]交叉→重叠
over过度,过分,超过+flow流动→流出来了,溢出
over翻转+take拿,占领→v.袭击,压倒
over在……之上+come来→来到上面→战胜
over在……之上+hang悬挂→v.悬于……之上, 悬垂
over在……之上+look看→在上面看→俯视,引申为疏忽
over在……之上+ride骑→骑在上面→推翻[下面的]
over在……之上+whelm推翻;淹没→翻过来→压倒
over过度,过分,超过+act演出→v.表演过火

Sentence.sentence: What it is wrong to condemn her for is overlooking your hard work.
One crucial aspect of Einstein's training that is overlooked is the years of philosophy he read as a teenager—Kant, Schopenhauer and Spinoza, among others.

sentences.en: How could you overlook paying the rent?
We decided to overlook his mistake.
sentences.cn: 我们决定宽容他的过错。

sentences.en: The foreman overlooked a large number of workers.

jushi.english: The neighbors in the upstairs flat overlook our garden.
jushi.chinese: 住在楼上套房中的邻居可以俯瞰我们的花园。

jushi.english: She was prepared to overlook his faults.
jushi.chinese: 她不准备计较他的缺点。
